divs: Sighting DetailsYOU WOULD NEVER BELEIVE WHAT ME AND MY FAMILY WITNESSED!IT CAME THROUGH THE SKY FOR 3 MONTHS IN A ROW . AT THE END OF THE MONTH WELL AUGUST SEPTEMBER AND OCTOBER WE HEARD IT FIRST 2 MONTHS THEN WE FIGURED WE WOULD CATCH��� WHAT IT WAS 3RD MONTH AND WE DID.THE FIRST 2 TIMES THE KIDS THOUGHT ALIENS WAS COMING TO GET THEM THEY SAID WHILE LAYING IN BED THEY WOULD COVER UP THEIR HEAD AND HOPE IT WOULD GO AWAY.SO WE KNEW ABOUT WHAT TIME IT WOULD BE BACK SO WE WATCHED FOR IT. WHEN IT CAME BACK WE GOT TO SEE IT MY HUSBAND SAID HE WOULD NEVER FORGET WHAT HE SEEN IT LOOKED LIKE A BIG CITY MANY CASTLES IN THE SKY LOOKED LIKE BALLS WITH NEEEDLES THROUGH THEM LIKE THOSE BUILDINGS OVER IN ARABIA THE BOTTOM HAD A HUGE BIG RED DOME LIGHT UNDERNEATH IT. NO SOUND IT WAS RIGHT ABOVE THE TREE LINES AND IT MOVED REAL SLOW MY HUSBAND COULD OF SHOT IT OUT OF THE SKY IT WAS THAT LOW IT WASN'T IN NO HURRY IT OWNED THE SKY WHERE WE LIVED WAS A HOT SPOT FOR U.F.O.S.MY HUSBAND SAID AS LOW AS��� IT WAS IT WOULDN'T BE DETECTED BY RADAR.
Summary: we seen u.f.o.s alot where we use to live this thing looked like a city out of the middle east with the balls on top of the castle with a needle sticking out of it and a big red round light on the bottom
